_header: Thou sinful man of reason that walkest here up and down
_description: A lament of the Virgin Mary — three stanzas rhyme royal

BodAsh189.First Lines:
Thou synfull man of resoun þat walkest here vp & downeCast
                    þy respeccyoun one my mortall countenaunce…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…I am thy frend vnfeyned & euer haue beLoue my son kepe
                    well hys lawes & come dewll with me
BodAsh189.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 16-17.
Saupe,  Karen,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Marian
                    Lyrics.
